about_the_game:
Young madam, AI beast girl, Chinese girl, Insane girl, Weak girl, and Lively, outrageous and shy girl. Maids of different styles are taught by the store manager.

Mouth stopper, whip, water bottle, pull bead, shaking stick. Each maid has her own props.

Each role has exclusive Japanese dubbing and interactive dubbing for more than 10 seconds;

There is no in-app purchase in the game, and you will get 500 diamonds to start the shop. Click + immediately add 200 diamonds (cheating mode);

Collect and obtain random materials, materials are randomly made into food, food is sold for diamonds., extract role fragments from the diamonds, and use the fragments to recruit the roles who the store manager likes!

This is the second product we have developed. Please forgive and correct any deficiencies. We will try our best to update it;



Although it is less than 10% from our crowdfunding goal, I still want to thank the 20 players who participated in the crowdfunding.

The sale of all games (excluding refunds) will support us to continue developing games (or new games)! ! !

Thank you for your donation: "Nuo"

content_descriptors.notes: The content of the game is not suitable for public occasions, and all the characters are over 18 years old.

detailed_description:
Young madam, AI beast girl, Chinese girl, Insane girl, Weak girl, and Lively, outrageous and shy girl. Maids of different styles are taught by the store manager.

Mouth stopper, whip, water bottle, pull bead, shaking stick. Each maid has her own props.

Each role has exclusive Japanese dubbing and interactive dubbing for more than 10 seconds;

There is no in-app purchase in the game, and you will get 500 diamonds to start the shop. Click + immediately add 200 diamonds (cheating mode);

Collect and obtain random materials, materials are randomly made into food, food is sold for diamonds., extract role fragments from the diamonds, and use the fragments to recruit the roles who the store manager likes!

This is the second product we have developed. Please forgive and correct any deficiencies. We will try our best to update it;



Although it is less than 10% from our crowdfunding goal, I still want to thank the 20 players who participated in the crowdfunding.

The sale of all games (excluding refunds) will support us to continue developing games (or new games)! ! !

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Sound Device
